data.text: @Shaunoel Hey Shaun I'm really sorry about the delay. Unfortunately the convenience fee is charged to every ticket purchase, even from the box office. I apologize for the inconvenience this causes you.  *DJ
@ZapposTheater I can’t believe you guys still haven’t responded to me .. I’m really disappointed in your customer service

@Shaunoel Shaun, we are currently waiting on a response from the Theater team. Once we receive feedback from them, we will reach out to you. We appreciate your patience and we apologize for the inconvenience.  *DO
@ZapposTheater Anything you can do to help?
@Shaunoel I'm so sorry about this Shaun. I'm also sorry you had an unpleasant experience. Our goal is to make sure everyone is cared for. *AU

@ZapposTheater That is so confusing, and on top of all this, while we were waiting and asking questions, the lady at the ticket counter told my mom and I that if we didn’t have the money to buy them then we are wasting her time (when we were asking questions)

@Shaunoel Hi there! I'm so sorry about that Shaun, I'm waiting on further confirmation. It seems that the reason for the additional fees is because the tickets are still processed through Ticketmaster and there isn't a way to avoid the fees. I'm still waiting for confirmation on... 1/2
@ZapposTheater No one got back to me
@Shaunoel I'm sorry about this. I'm looking into this as we speak. I'll get back to you once I hear word back. *AU
@ZapposTheater @PHVegas @JLo Yes, and I didn’t end up buying them even though I want them because of that situation, please help
@Shaunoel @PHVegas @JLo Hi Shaun! I'm so sorry about this. I'm happy to look into this for you. You went to the physical location of the theater, correct? *AU
